predict module¶

predict.assessProfit(modelName, data, target, future, benchmark='VTSAX')¶

Assess profitability of model-based strategy compared to a market benchmark

Parameters

  • modelName (str) – Folder name to load model from

  • data (pandas.DataFrame) – Dataset to predict using

  • target (str) – Name of column to predict

  • future (str) – Name of column to assess profit/loss using

  • benchmark (str, optional) – Stock symbol to compare model return to, defaults to “VTSAX

predict.getWeights(preds, labels)¶

Determine portfolio weight for each stock symbol

Parameters

  • preds (list) – List of stock prices predicted by model

  • labels (list) – List of actual stock prices

Returns

List of relative weights for each stock

Return type

list

predict.strategy(pred, label)¶

Determine portfolio weight of a single stock symbol

Parameters

  • pred (float) – Stock price predicted by model

  • label (float) – Actual stock price

Returns

Relative weight

Return type

float

Stock-Evaluator
